meta.title: Chaudandigadhi Municipality Digital Profile
meta.description: Comprehensive digital profile of Chaudandigadhi Municipality - demographics, economy, social status, and infrastructure

story.title: A Community of Heritage
story.p1: Nestled in the heart of Koshi Province, Chaudandigadhi is home to a vibrant community of 53,631 residents who call this remarkable municipality their own.
story.p2: Across 10 distinct wards, families have built their lives, creating a tapestry of culture and tradition that spans generations.
story.p3: With 12,703 households, each telling its own unique story, Chaudandigadhi stands as a testament to the enduring spirit of community and progress.
